column1: officer-vic-3809,10 Rush Lily Drive Officer VIC 3809,"AVOID THE RUSH. BUY IN RUSH LILY.
Overlooking a peaceful waterway surrounded by native trees is a townhouse that feels anything but.""

Almost like yin and yang, on the north side of the property you're greeted with modern living with all the benefits of the Arena estate, one of Officer's premier areas. On the south side you have a tranquil setting and your own private retreat where you'll be consumed by nature and a soft setting sun.
All the while you are walking distance to the Cardinia Train Station, Arena shopping centre and some of the best local schools.
The townhouse itself is immaculate. Featuring:
- Three bedrooms, master with en-suite and walk-in robe
- A well appointed kitchen with large stone bench tops
- A dining area that comfortably fits an eight-seat table
- Split systems in all bedrooms plus a large climate control unit downstairs
- Double car garage with internal access.
Relax, unwind, the rush is over.","SOLD - $480,000","3

officer-vic-3809,46 Lexington Cresent Officer VIC 3809,"A PLACE TO CALL HOME
This meticulously presented three bedroom home stands above the crowd with a superior finish, a classic modern appeal and a timeless elegance that you will be proud to call home.

The family friendly floor plan boasts generous spaces and convenience with two sperate living zones, including theatre room complete with screen and projector and a gas log fire, open plan family room I dining and fully appointed stone kitchen with quality appliances & walk in pantry. The bedroom accommodation will meet your needs with built in's in the secondary rooms and the master showcasing full ensuite with double vanity, double shower and stunning travertine tiles floor to ceiling, with the family bathroom completed to the same style and standard.

Additional desired features include, ducted heating, two split system air conditioners, trifold doors exiting to the private alfresco and beautifully manicured gardens complete with irrigation system, security doors, double glazed windows walk in linen and side access perfect to store your trailer and garden equipment.

Nicely positioned in the growth corridor of Beaconsfield and Officer where the estate is establishing to be highly sought after with the convenience of parks, gardens, walking tracks, a vast array of schools, shopping zones and public transport making for easy living.
Whether it be a first home buyer, investment or downsizing, this home is certain to meet all your needs. For further information contact Jeanine on 0438 332 411.","SOLD - $592,000","3

officer-vic-3809,18 Callistemon Street Officer VIC 3809,"FAMILY VALUES HERE! OFFICER AT IT'S BEST

This exceptional SJD family designed home that is only 2 years young is ready for the next owner/s to move straight in. Featuring four spacious bedrooms and three separate living zones. The master bedroom features a walk-in robe and modern ensuite bathroom equipped with double stone vanities and oversized shower. The remaining three bedrooms boast built in robes and have good access to the main bathroom.

Rich in living spaces that include open plan kitchen/meals/lounge areas, second lounge/theatre room and children's retreat as detailed on the floorplan. The kitchen is impressive with 900mm oven/cooktop, glass splashback, stone benches, walk in panty and breakfast bar that overlooks the large open plan dining/lounge areas. Additional features include ducted heating, split system cooling, double blinds, double glazing, security doors, high ceilings, double remote garage with internal access, garden shed and more.
Outdoors is a secure well-manicured generous 400m2 block and a fantastic alfresco area that is ideal for entertaining in style in year-round comfort.
* Quality Schools Nearby e.g. Bridgewood Primary School & Officer Secondary College
* Don't wait for land to title, this home is ready NOW!

officer-vic-3809,13 Goldsborough Drive Officer VIC 3809,"The ultimate Tradies dream!

Secluded, spacious and immaculately presented, this single level beauty is a tradie's haven, allowing you to store your trailer and tools securely in the garage without having to detach it from your car each day.

Glistening with its 8.5 ft ceilings, Tasmanian oak timber floors and a fresh update with brand new carpets, this stunning home offers 4 large bedrooms plus study and an incredible open plan kitchen, living and dining area. The well-appointed kitchen is certainly an eye-opener featuring quality stainless-steel appliances, dishwasher, oversized oven/cooktop, soft closing cupboard draws and a huge butlers pantry for extra storage and preparation space. French style servery windows open out to the fabulous covered alfresco with an in-built barbeque area making this the perfect entertaining space.

The master suite is the ultimate adults retreat with your very own private decked area, a large walk-in robe and an enticing ensuite showcasing a luxurious double shower. The three separate bedrooms are all great in size, complete with built-in robes. The main bathroom and separate toilet services the rest of the household.
A thoughtful design to cater for all buyers, this quality Aaron J built home is spacious and peaceful, with exceptional extras including
column2: ducted heating, zoned refrigerated cooling, security alarm system, double blinds throughout, new carpets, ceiling fans in all bedrooms, sizable laundry, extremely low maintenance yard & easy to maintain gardens, watering system, an impressive 4- car remote-control garage with roller door access and a storage unit to fit all the gardening tools.

officer-vic-3809,42 Flinders Park Drive Officer VIC 3809,"ONE FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY!

Join the vibrant & ever popular Arena community and enjoy the convenience of being less than 1km walk to the Cardinia Road train station as well as supermarkets, speciality shops and restaurants. Oozing street appeal with a modern facade, decking, luscious green lawns and landscaped gardens, it is evident from the outset that this home is a classy entertainer!

Offering an open plan design centred on indoor and outdoor entertaining with the lounge, dining area and living room adjoining a central kitchen with timber bi fold doors opening onto a decked alfresco area. The large outdoor entertaining area includes water feature and spa which is a real feature being built into the decking and overlooking the yard, which still leaves room for the kids to play or for pets.

There are four bedrooms, the master with walk in robe and a full ensuite with double vanities and a separate toilet. The home is fitted with quality window furnishings, contemporary tonings and features 9ft ceilings, ducted heating and evaporative cooling. The well-appointed kitchen features stunning glass splashback, Caesar stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and 900ml oven.

The extra-large 6 x 7.4m garage on remote is also sure to please, with ample room for vehicle/equipment storage. Nearby parkland and ample walking tracks, wetlands area and playgrounds offers the lifestyle your family deserves and with all of the hard work done already, simply move in and enjoy this stylish home!!!","SOLD - $572,000","4
